titlesplash.name: 600ft
titlesplash.description: In the depths of the ocean, where sunlight rarely pierces through the water's murky veil, there you live aboard a submarine. It's a world in itself, a metal giant that flows through the undersea depths, carrying a diverse crew of sailors into the unknown. But within the confines of this steel vessel, reality begins to blur, and sanity is a fragile commodity. As you walk the fine line between reality and illusion, your interactions with the crew will shape your journey. Will you uncover the truth of what's happening on board, or will you succumb to the inevitable madness and fall victim to an unknown truth? You must talk to your fellow crew members and find out what is really going on. There are several objects and people on board that may point you in the right direction of what’s going on. Make sure you work quickly; a mind is a terrible thing to waste or, in this case, lose...
titlesplash.intro:
You zoned out and slowly come back to reality. You realize you are outside of Chad’s room but vaguely remember coming over to talk to him. You walk through the galley, assuming you needed something from Chad, hoping to remember when you get there. 
At any point, you can type 'help' to bring up valid commands.
titlesplash.Objective: Find out what is going on, on the ship and if there is anyone behind it or if something is behind it...

Items.Advil: Advil can be used to maintain and regain sanity throughout your journey. Just remember you are underwater, and there are limited resources.

rooms.name: Supply Room
rooms.intros: It is easy to stop feeling like yourself in such grim conditions thankfully the supply room has just the thing to take the edge off. The room is filled with different medicine and supplies need to make you feel like yourself again

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.Description: A room that can be described as organized chaos, nothings looks like it is where it is supposed to be but you know where everything is. Oddly enough there is a key on the floor that stands out from the chaos

rooms.name: John's Quarters
Description: A clean and organized room, not pictures or anything to show some type of personality. It has the bare minimum to survive and be comfortable

dialogue.question1: Has something felt off with Connor to you?
dialogue.question2: Has Chad been acting weird to you
dialogue.question3: Alan has been pretty on edge, do you think happened?

responses.2: Chad is always weird with all those voices, if he was acting normal then I'd be concerned
responses.3: Someone went through his room and put a dent in his safe, so I would be on edge too.

rooms.name: Chad's Quarters
rooms.Description: A room full of personality, posters all around with different dragons and fantasy characters.

intros: Hey buddy!!! Great to see you, come on in, I am just reading my DM manual

dialogue.question1: Have you seen Connor he has been acting a little different
dialogue.question2: What do you think of John?

responses.1: Thats a weird question to ask you ok?
responses.2: He is a little introverted but a lot of fun to game with
responses.3: He is in his room someone destroyed it, not cool at all

rooms.name: Connor's Quarters
rooms.Description: A rather plain room, clean and organized but nothing special about it

dialogue.question2: You talk to Chad about the game tonight
dialogue.question3: You worked with John right? You get along?

responses.2: yes and if not I will

rooms.name: Alan's Quarters
rooms.Description: A room that is usually organized and clean is now completely destroyed. There is a dented safe in the corner and boxes and paper thrown across the ground

intros: Hey young blood what do you need, I am just cleaning up

responses.1: Someone broke into my room and destroyed everything even dented my safe.
responses.2: Chad is too busy with his elf dragon books to know what happened.
responses.3: um....... no did you see anything
responses.4: John doesn't leave his room he doesnt have to
